nodes.text: Supreme General was a military rank within the Chiss Ascendancy's Defense Force. Ba'kif held the rank around the time of an attack on Csilla. The rank of Supreme General was second only to that of Supreme Admiral in the Ascendancy's Defense Force.

The Supreme General was an important position within the Defense Hierarchy Council. However, upon promotion to Supreme General, Ba'kif no longer exercised direct control over the Expansionary Defense Fleet's operations, as he once had from his Expansionary Defense Fleet office on Naporar. However, he did retain command over all personnel in the Fleet.
